title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 756.4 - Health care practitioner services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 756.4 - Health care practitioner services

State Regulations

The operator shall ensure that: (a) a health care practitioner licensed, certified, or authorized under title eight of the education law, acting within
such practitioner's lawful scope of practice, performs the abortion; and
(b) an abortion is performed
only when, according to the practitioner's reasonable and good faith
professional judgment based on the facts of the patient's case, the patient is
within twenty-four weeks from the commencement of pregnancy, or there is an
absence of fetal viability, or the abortion is necessary to protect the
patient's life or health. Notes

756.4

York State Register January 19, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 03, eff. 1/19/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
